english.segment1: Tell all the dreams that you have let slip right through your hands. Do you feel lost inside of someone else's life
english.segment2: And we're not gonna live forever. Can you tell me is it now or never. I'm not gonna make up your mind
english.segment3: I don't wanna live without you. And I don't wanna live a lie. We'll never know till we try. Yeah we'll never know till we try
english.segment4: Failure is the only way to learn till you've come undone. The rest will never find out what they might have been
english.segment5: And we're not gonna live forever. Can you tell me is it now or never. I'm not gonna make up your mind
english.segment6: I don't wanna live without you. And I don't wanna live a lie. We'll never know till we try. Yeah we'll never know till we try
english.segment7: So don't tell me sometime just where did we go wrong, yeah
english.segment8: And we're not gonna live forever. Can you tell me is it now or never. I'm not gonna make up your mind
english.segment9: I don't wanna live without you. And I don't wanna live a lie. We'll never know till we try. Yeah we'll never know till we try
